channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
i was adding some abbys , after i done that i tryed to kill em with my acc.
i got 2 prob's : they just keep hittin 1 >.<? and i need lvl 82 slay
would someone please tell me how to make a slayer area.
thnx , Gl0wi

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

[quote=“cwg452003, post:2, topic:218947”]Well find where it is being called that you are attacking an npc, then under there it should have the npc id of the abby and say that you need a certain slayer lvl. For instance

if(npcID == (abby) && playerLevel[18] == 82

I think its player level 18[/quote]

How do you mean
